section.title: workflow, master list of Workflow
section.para: Workflow is a feature in xTuple that allows you to link activities together into dependent sequences (workflows), and to assign activities to specific users. For example, you can create workflow for fulfilling sales orders. When a new sales order comes into the system, it can generate activities for picking and shipping the order, and assign these activities to users to perform.

To set up workflow, go to System > Setup> Master Information > Workflow. The following screen will appear:
Workflow master list
